UpdatePackageSource.Name: iu_core
UpdatePackageSource.Info:
[+] Added Image Editor. Now you can easily edit screenshots you've made, annotate, highlight or obfuscate parts of the screenshot. [+] Scripting API changes: added PCRE-compatible class CRegExp, CWebBrowser, function tr() for internalization. [+] Added vk.com support [f] Fixed crash when extracting frames from a video file with subtitles (access violation in VSFilter.dll aka DirectVobSub). [~] Fixed incorrect icon sizes in file list when high DPI is set [+] Added ukrainian translation (thanks to Yurii Petrashko)
New servers: [+] Google Drive [+] 5cm.ru
Thanks to Alex_Qwerty: [+] embedupload.com [+] jheberg.net.xml [+] mirrorupload.net.xml [+] multiup.org.xml
[~] Fixed small bugs
